alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 4:02AM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield County. In New York, Western Schenectady, Eastern Rensselaer, Schoharie, Eastern Columbia and Western Ulster Counties. In Vermont, Bennington and eastern Windham Counties. In Massachusetts, southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the early part of the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster
